scripts.yarn-install-react: (cd reactjs/expressApi9MB && yarn install) && (cd reactjs/expressHtml9MB && yarn install)
scripts.yarn-install-vue: (cd vuejs/expressApi9MB && yarn install) && (cd vuejs/expressHtml9MB && yarn install) && (cd vuejs/koaHtml9MB && yarn install)
